step_feedback.feedback: Great job starting with a comfortable position! Remember to gently squeeze your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle.
Excellent movement! Focus on making the circular motion continuous, bringing your shoulders back and then down smoothly.
You're doing well with the repetitions! Try to inhale deeply as you pull your shoulders back to maximize the benefit.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with your shoulder rolls! Keep up the smooth, circular movements. Remember to inhale as you bring your shoulders back to help with breathing and lymphatic flow.
